reviewText: Great PBS concert and quick shipping
Nice to see these oldtimers back at work...they still perform good live...a shame that the songs are cut as if it is a television show...
Awesome selections. Love it. Reminiscing the good old disco days of fun and music. I would definitely recommend this to all disco lovers.

I bought both the Get Down TONIGHT DVD's. They are well worth the money an effort.
Are there are similar DVD's available. I would recommend this to all Sould Disco and R&B music lovers. The quality is quite good and sound is not bad al all.
